Position Our hotel is located in the Trentino region, in Dimaro, a charming town at the foot of the Brenta Dolomites, an ideal destination point for those that want a vacation filled with relaxation and sports.
Restaurant Refined national and international dishes complete the menu entrées while our most discerning guests can choose from our à la carte menu. An abundant salad bar accompanies all meals. Our restaurant has a flexible timetable allowing you to fully experience your vacation in the best possible manner.
